definition: to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing

sentences.english: To integrate government and industry resources to develop nanotechnology is important and urgently required.
sentences.chinese: 结合政府和企业资源去发展奈米科技是重要且急迫地。

sentences.english: The good news is that we are moving forward with a sense of urgency equal to the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是我们在以足以应对挑战的急迫感前行。

sentences.english: But it is urgent work that cannot be deferred.
sentences.chinese: 但他是有急迫性的工作且不能被延迟。

sentences.english: The need for aid is especially acute in Sub-Saharan Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲对援助的需要尤为急迫。

sentences.english: It will be another day of tension and urgency.
sentences.chinese: 今天又会是一个充满紧张与急迫感的一天。

sentences.english: To obtain a computer from his father, the boy gave his eyeteeth for it.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩非常急迫地要他老爸给他一部电脑。
他的双臂开始急迫的挥动，他在指什么？

sentences.english: Her voice was shrill with urgency and rioted in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音因急迫而异常尖锐，打破了黑暗。

sentences.english: I wasn't creating any urgency for them to heal.
sentences.chinese: 我没有让他们意识到需要和解的急迫性。

sentences.english: XieXiaoZhang urgent hope building a solid career, application with Korea regiment together.
sentences.chinese: 谢孝彰急迫希望建功立业，申请随韩团同行。

sentences.english: A shortage of suitable kidneys for transplant is the most common problem.
sentences.chinese: 肾脏供体的短缺是其中最急迫的问题。

sentences.english: The cries and shouts became louder and more urgent.
sentences.chinese: 哭喊声越来越响，更加急迫。

sentences.english: Pray come instantly to Este, where I shall be waiting in the utmost anxiety for your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 请立即到埃斯来，我将在那里万分急迫地等你。

sentences.english: Were there any seals in the park a few days ago?
sentences.chinese: 万分急迫三天前公园里有一些海豹吗？不，没有。

sentences.english: Everybody has a different sense of urgency in this life.
sentences.chinese: 每个人对人生的急迫性都有不同看法。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the pressing issue has to do with data categorization.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，急迫的问题是必须处理数据分类。

definition: to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
